## How to use these videos

These are optional “extra help” videos for Week 2.  
Watch them when the reading feels abstract or when you want a second explanation of the same concept.

## Classification vs Regression

**Regression vs. Classification — What’s the difference?**\
*by AWS Educate* (2020s, ~5–10 min) — Beginner explanation of what changes when your target is a **number** vs a **label**.

## Generalization: why we split into training vs test

**Train/Test Split (and why training accuracy can mislead you)**\
*by StatQuest (Josh Starmer)* (2018–2020s, ~10–15 min) — Why we don’t evaluate on the same rows we trained on.

{{< video https://www.youtube.com/embed/fSytzGwwBVw >}}

**Cross Validation (bonus idea for small datasets)**\
*by StatQuest (Josh Starmer)* (2018–2020s, ~10–15 min) — Why results can be unstable when you don’t have many rows.

{{< video https://www.youtube.com/embed/Gv9_4yMHFhI >}}

## Underfitting and Overfitting

**Overfitting (video)**  
by deeplizard (~4 min) — Explains what overfitting is and what it tends to look like when you compare training vs test performance.
